head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GUTMAN, JEROME R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GUTMAN, JEROME R.

block.p: GUTMAN--Jerome R., age 80, on Sunday July 3, 2005, husband of 43 years to Elizabeth Hardy Gutman of Fairfield, CT. Services on Thursday July 7, 2005 at 11:00 A.M. from Temple Israel, 14 Coleytown Rd., Westport, CT. Interment following at Willowbrook Cemetery in Westport, CT. Memorial contributions to American Diabetes Assoc., P.O. Box, 1131 Fairfax, VA 22038. For information contact Abraham L. Green & Son Funeral Home, Fairfield, CT.
